Text: REBen I spoke with your dad last week We had a good conversation and I look forward to meeting him when the GS team next gets to Cincinnati Many thanks for your help Regards Jack Original Message From mailto Sent Monday April PM To Subject Jack I hope that you remember me We played golf together at The Breakers course about three weeks ago I am currently working in Enrons power trading group but prior to this I was in Enrons corporate development group I mentioned to you that my Dad is Jim Rogers Chairman and CEO of Cinergy Corp which is a mid size Bil utility located in Cincinnati He has been CEO of this company for over years and is always looking for ways to grow his company through strategic acquisitions In the past he has talked to some of your bankers but I would like to try and get you two together to see if there is something your companies can work on together I really think the two of you could have a successful meeting He is very forward thinking and is quite open to new ideas and creative structures His contact information is listed below I hope all is going well and again it was a pleasure to have met you and play golf with you at your club Please let me know if you need any additional information Regards Ben Rogers Enron Corp Contact Information James E Rogers Chairman President and CEO Cinergy Corp PH Fax
